name: ChaseR (itch) (pytholge)
description:
ChaseR is an "infinite racer" game created in PICO-8 by me, Pytholge. Your only objective is to dodge traffic. I made this in my Game Design class I took in my junior year of high school. 

ChaseR took inspiration from endless runners, like Subway Surfers, Sonic Dash, and Temple Run that I played when I was younger. Being a fan of racing games, I decided to combine the two into an "infinite racer". Development began on February 21st, 2021 and ended on March 4th, 2021. 

The name "ChaseR" comes from a mistake I made in the title screen. While the other letters are about the same size and share the same color palette, the "R" is just red and slanted a bit. I was annoyed at first, but then I realized the R looked pretty cool, so I left it in there.
